snippet: Here are several paragraphs from a 2010 article by the editor of the Modern Love column. Called “Explaining the Irrational: Here Goes …,” it is his answers to “head-scratching questions about love.” Can you choose the best word or phrase...
abstract: Here are several paragraphs from a 2010 article by the editor of the Modern Love column. Called “Explaining the Irrational: Here Goes …,” it is his answers to “head-scratching questions about love.” Can you choose the best word or phrase for each blank?

headline.main: Test Yourself | Advice on Love and Romance
